original_title: Three arrested with type of narcotic detected for first time in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: Police have apprehended three persons in possession of 115 grams of a narcotic drug called Mephedrone (4-MMC), Ada Derana reporter said.
The apprehension has been made by Walana Central Anti-Vice Striking Unit today (July 05).
Furthermore, it is reported that the relevant type of narcotic was detected for the first time in Sri Lanka.
